description: Slick grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square centered on a point within range and turns it into difficult terrain
name: Grease

description: You create three glowing darts of magical force
name: Magic Missile

description: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber.
name: Sleep

description: You create a floating, spectral weapon
name: Spiritual Weapon

description: You create an invisible, magical eye within range that hovers in the air
name: Arcane Eye

description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence.
name: Banishment

description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range
name: Fireball

description: This spell channels vitality into plants within a specific area.
name: Plant Growth

description: You speak a word of power that can overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range
name: Power Word Stun

description: You create a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of your choice that you can see within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to many other targets
name: Chain Lightning

description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out
name: Circle of Death

description: A vertical column of divine fire roars down from the sky.
name: Flame Strike

description: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire appears
name: Flaming Sphere

description: You attempt to turn one creature that you can see within range into stone.
name: Flesh to Stone

description: You unleash a virulent disease on a creature that you can see within range.
name: Harm

description: A silvery beam of pale light shines down.
name: Moonbeam

description: You tap into the nightmares of a creature you can see within range and create an illusory manifestation of its deepest fears, visible only to that creature.
name: Phantasmal Killer

description: A black beam of enervating energy springs from your finger toward a creature within range.
name: Ray of Enfeeblement

description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range.
name: Scorching Ray

description: You create a shard of ice and fling it at one creature within range.
name: Ice Knife

description: You cause up to six pillars of stone to burst from places on the ground that you can see within range.
name: Bones of the Earth

description: You conjure up a wave of water that crashes down on an area within range.
name: Tidal Wave

description: You conjure up a sphere of ice with a 10-foot radius on a point you can see within range.
name: Icey Sphere

description: Flames wreathe one creature you can see within range.
name: Immolation

description: A 20-foot-radius sphere of whirling air springs into existence centered on a point you choose within range.
name: Storm Sphere

description: You point at a place within range, and a glowing 1-foot ball of emerald acid streaks there and explodes.
name: Vitriolic Sphere

description: You conjure up a wall of swirling sand on the ground at a point you can see within range.
name: Wall of Sand
